item.sacred_obsidian.tooltip: Extend the obsidian block towards the target, dealing %s damage and marking the target for %s seconds. The obsidian block lasts for %s seconds, and the weapon cooldown is %s seconds. Shift + Right Click to switch forms
enchantment.netpdrmod.obsidian_reach.des: Increases the range at which the Sacred Obsidian can extend obsidian blocks.
enchantment.netpdrmod.obsidian_power.des: Increases the damage dealt to targets when the Sacred Obsidian extends obsidian blocks.
advancement.netpdrmod.root.title: Sacred Obsidian
advancement.netpdrmod.root.description: Welcome to the sacred obsidian advancements
advancement.netpdrmod.switch_form.title: Switch Form
advancement.netpdrmod.switch_form.descri: Successfully switched the form of the sacred obsidian
